text: Brewster McCloud is a 1970 American fantasy comedy movie directed by Robert Altman and produced by Lou Adler. It stars Bud Cort, Sally Kellerman, Michael Murphy, Shelley Duvall, Corey Fischer, Stacy Keach, Jennifer Salt, Harvey Keitel and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * Category:1970 fantasy movies Category:1970 comedy movies Category:American fantasy-comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Altman
title: Brewster McCloud
